body: @Emillyaika This is why we can't have nice things.
Actually finished translating the main ultramadam series (1-9). Because of your comment, I'll just keep it exclusively for the commissioner.

Not getting paid,so i'm not gonna translate the whole thing, but I'll give a gist of whats going on.  

So seems like theres still baddies on earth even after the end of the first season of Ultramadam.  Now Madam (the silver goddeess of light shes called) has to keep fighting leftover baddies. But shes to old now at 40, and has to many battle scars to keep up with the more youthful monsters (who are highschoolers mrophing into monsters). 

So now a new hero is to be her successor who is also a young girl (though the art makes her seem mature). 

Not going to explain the side story.
I like it . A sexy strong woman
